external_games.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms Maker
Romance of the Three Kingdoms Maker
Romance of the Three Kingdoms Maker

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms Maker
summary:
"Romance of the Three Kingdoms Maker" celebrates the 30th anniversary of the "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" series. It has been realized through a collaboration between the creators of the "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" series, Koei Tecmo Games, and the creators of the "TSUKURU" series, KADOKAWA.
"Romance of the Three Kingdoms Maker" is based on the classic title "Romance of the Three Kingdoms II." Keeping the same simple and fast-paced game play, you can now enjoy high personalized original scenarios featuring freely editable officers, countries, forces, rewards and battlefields.
